author: manunlp
content:
Is there a way to directly access the beacon API of a beacon node in the devnet?

There is https://beacon.peerdas-devnet-2.ethpandaops.io/, but it is a load-balancing proxy.
I see in Ethereum node inventory `beacon_uri` such as https://rpc.lighthouse-geth-1.peerdas-devnet-2.ethpandaops.io, but it requires credentials.
(cc <@412614104222531604> )
